anya-e0805n2:6_1: Ettha ca līnaṁ aṅganti liṅgaṁ, apākaṭo avayavo,
anya-e0805n2:6_2: purisotiādīnañhi pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya nipphāditānaṁ saddappatirūpakānaṁ nāmikapadānaṁ paṭhamaṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ pakatirūpaṁ apākaṭattā,
anya-e0805n2:6_6: liṅganato vā liṅganti anvatthanāmavasena vā ‘‘dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṁ liṅga’’nti vacanato parasamaññāvasena vā liṅganti idha pāṭipadikāparanāmadheyyaṁ syādivibhatyantapadapakatirūpameva vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:7_0: Liṅgassattho nāma pabandhavisesākārena pavattamāne rūpādayo upādāya paññāpīyamāno tadaññānaññabhāvena anibbacanīyo samūhasantānādibhedo upādāpaññattisaṅkhāto ghaṭapaṭādivohārattho ca pathavīdhātuphassādīnaṁ sabhāvadhammānaṁ kāladesādibhedabhinnānaṁ vijātiyavinivatto sajātiyasādhāraṇo yathāsaṅketamāropasiddho tajjāpaññattisaṅkhāto kakkhaḷattaphusanādisāmaññākāro ca.
anya-e0805n2:8_0: So pana kammādisaṁsaṭṭho, suddho cāti duvidho.
anya-e0805n2:8_1: Tattha kammādīsu dutiyādīnaṁ vidhīyamānattā kammādisaṁsaggarahito liṅgasaṅkhyāparimāṇayutto,
anya-e0805n2:8_2: tabbinimuttupasaggādipadatthabhūto ca suddho saddattho idha liṅgattho nāma.
anya-e0805n2:9_0: Yo pana ākhyātakitakataddhitasamāsehi vutto kammādisaṁsaṭṭho attho,
anya-e0805n2:9_1: sopi dutiyādīnaṁ puna attanā vattabbassa atthavisesassābhāvena avisayattā,
anya-e0805n2:13_0: Saliṅge tāva – eso puriso, ete purisā, esā kaññā, etā kaññāyo, etaṁ cittaṁ, etāni cittāni.
anya-e0805n2:16_0: Liṅgādivinimutte sattāmatte – ca vā ha ahaṁ atthi sakkālabbhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:17_0: ‘‘Liṅgatthe paṭhamā’’ti adhikicca ‘‘ālapane cā’’ti ālapanatthe ca paṭhamā,
anya-e0805n2:17_1: abhimukhaṁ katvā lapanaṁ ālapanaṁ, āmantanaṁ avhānanti attho.
anya-e0805n2:18_0: Ettha ca āmantanaṁ nāma pageva laddhasarūpassa saddena abhimukhīkaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:18_2: tasmā āmantanasamaye kriyāyogābhāvato idaṁ kārakavohāraṁ na labhati.
anya-e0805n2:22_0: Bho purisa ehi, bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā etha.
anya-e0805n2:28_0: ‘‘Yena vā kayirate taṁ karaṇa’’nti ito ‘‘vā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n2:30_0: Yaṁ vā karoti, yaṁ vā vikaroti, yaṁ vā pāpuṇāti, taṁ kārakaṁ kammasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:31_0: Idha liṅgakālavacanamatantaṁ. Karīyatīti kammaṁ. Tattha kārakaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:31_2: taṁ pana kārakaṁ chabbidhaṁ kammaṁ kattā karaṇaṁ sampadānamapādānamokāso cāti. Tattha sabhāvato,
anya-e0805n2:31_3: parikappato vā kammādimhi satiyeva kriyābhāvato kammādīnaṁ channampi kārakavohāro siddhova hoti.
anya-e0805n2:32_0: Taṁ pana kammaṁ tividhaṁ nibbattanīyaṁ vikaraṇīyaṁ pāpaṇīyañcāti.
anya-e0805n2:32_1: Yathā – mātā puttaṁ vijāyati, āhāro sukhaṁ janayati. Ghaṭaṁ karoti devadatto, kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṁ karoti, suvaṇṇaṁ keyūraṁ, kaṭakaṁ vā karoti, vīhayo lunāti.
anya-e0805n2:32_2: Devadatto nivesanaṁ pavisati, ādiccaṁ passati, dhammaṁ suṇāti, paṇḍite payirupāsati.
anya-e0805n2:36_0: Ettha ca icchitānicchitakathitākathitādibhedamanapekkhitvā sabbasaṅgāhakavasena ‘‘yaṁ karoti taṁ kamma’’nti vuttattā,
anya-e0805n2:36_1: atthantaravikappanavādhikārato ca sabbattha imināva kammasaññā hoti.
anya-e0805n2:37_0: Tattha anicchitakammaṁ yathā – kaṇṭakaṁ maddati, visaṁ gilati,
anya-e0805n2:38_0: Akathitakammaṁ yathā – yaññadattaṁ kambalaṁ yācate brāhmaṇo.
anya-e0805n2:38_1: Ettha hi ‘‘kambala’’miti kathitakammaṁ dvikammikāya yācanakriyāya pattumicchitatarattā.
anya-e0805n2:38_3: Tathā samiddhaṁ dhanaṁ bhikkhate, ajaṁ gāmaṁ nayati, parābhavantaṁ purisaṁ, mayaṁ pucchāma gotamaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:39_1: yathā – kaṭo karīyate devadattena, sugatena desito dhammo,
anya-e0805n2:41_0: 286.Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṁ kārite vā.
anya-e0805n2:42_0: Gamu sappa gatimhi, budha bodhane, budha avagamane vā, bhuja pālanabyavaharaṇesu, paṭha byattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, hara haraṇe, kara karaṇe,
anya-e0805n2:42_1: si saye iccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ payoge kārite sati payojjakakattubhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā.
anya-e0805n2:43_0: Yo koci puriso gāmaṁ gacchati, tamañño payojayati.
anya-e0805n2:43_1: Puriso purisaṁ gāmaṁ gamayati, purisena vā gāmaṁ gamayati.
anya-e0805n2:43_7: purisena vā kammaṁ kārāpayati, puriso purisaṁ sayāpayati.
anya-e0805n2:47_1: Kāladdhānaṁ dabbaguṇakriyāhi accantasaṁyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi liṅgehi dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:48_0: Kāle tāva – sattāhaṁ gavapānaṁ, māsaṁ maṁsodanaṁ, saradaṁ ramaṇīyā nadī,
anya-e0805n2:48_1: sabbakālaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ nandanaṁ, māsaṁ sajjhāyati, tayo māse abhidhammaṁ desesi.
anya-e0805n2:49_0: Addhāne – yojanaṁ vanarāji, yojanaṁ dīgho pabbato, kosaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0805n2:52_0: Kammappavacanīyehi nipātopasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:54_3: nadiyā saha avabaddhāti attho, anu sāriputtaṁ paññavā.
anya-e0805n2:55_0: Lakkhaṇādīsu ‘‘lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhānabhāga vicchāsu pati pari anavo’’ti pati pari anūnaṁ kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā.
anya-e0805n2:56_0: Lakkhaṇe sūriyuggamanaṁ pati dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0805n2:56_1: rukkhaṁ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṁ pari, rukkhaṁ anu.
anya-e0805n2:57_0: Itthambhūtakkhāne sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pati, mātaraṁ pari, mātaraṁ anu.
anya-e0805n2:58_0: Bhāge yadettha maṁ pati siyā, maṁ pari, maṁ anu, taṁ dīyatu.
anya-e0805n2:59_1: rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pari, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ anu.
anya-e0805n2:60_1: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ abhi.
anya-e0805n2:63_2: Antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nāḷandaṁ addhānamaggappaṭipanno,
anya-e0805n2:63_3: rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca majjheti attho. Abhito gāmaṁ vasati, parito gāmaṁ vasati, nadiṁ nerañjaraṁ pati,
anya-e0805n2:63_5: Paṭibhantu taṁ cunda bojjhaṅgā, upamā maṁ paṭibhāti,
anya-e0805n2:66_0: Tatiyāsattamīnamatthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:67_0: Tatiyatthe sace maṁ nālapissati, tvañca maṁ nābhibhāsasi, vinā saddhammaṁ kuto sukhaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:68_0: Sattamiyatthe– kāle, upānvajjhāvasassa payoge, adhisiṭṭhāvasānaṁ payoge, tappānacāre ca dutiyā.
anya-e0805n2:69_0: Kāle tāva – pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā.
anya-e0805n2:70_0: Upādipubbassa vasadhātussa payoge – gāmaṁ upavasati, gāmaṁ anuvasati, vihāraṁ adhivasati, gāmaṁ āvasati, agāraṁ ajjhāvasati. Tathā pathaviṁ adhisessati, gāmaṁ adhitiṭṭhati, gāmaṁ ajjhāvasati.
anya-e0805n2:71_0: Tappānacāresu – nadiṁ pivati, gāmaṁ carati iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:77_0: Yena vā kattā upakaraṇabhūtena vatthunā kriyaṁ abyavadhānena karoti, yena vā vikaroti, yena vā pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0805n2:78_1: ettha ca satipi sabbakārakānaṁ kriyāsādhakatte ‘‘yena vā kayirate’’ti visesetvā vacanaṁ kattūpakaraṇabhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamasseva gahaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:81_0: Sambhāvīyati taṁ vuttaṁ, karaṇaṁ nāma kāraka’’nti.
anya-e0805n2:83_0: Yathā – hatthena kammaṁ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, manasā dhammaṁ viññāya. Dattena vīhayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṁ jhāpeti.
anya-e0805n2:86_0: Kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:86_2: pubbasadisasamūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missaka sakhilatthādiyoge, kāladdhānesu,
anya-e0805n2:89_0: Yo kriyaṁ attappadhāno hutvā karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n2:90_1: Tattha yo sayameva kriyaṁ karoti, so suddhakattā.
anya-e0805n2:90_2: Yo aññaṁ kātuṁ samatthaṁ akarontaṁ kammaṁ niyojeti, so hetukattā,
anya-e0805n2:91_0: Yaṁ pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto,
anya-e0805n2:91_4: kiṁ tattha payojakabyāpārena akarontaṁ balena kārayati,
anya-e0805n2:95_0: Yo kattāraṁ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā cāti hetukattusaññā.
anya-e0805n2:96_0: Yo pana parassa kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti, so kammakattā nāma, yathā – sayaṁ karīyate kaṭo, sayameva paccate odanoti.
anya-e0805n2:99_0: Appayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0805n2:104_0: Nanu ca ‘‘saṁyogo jāyate’’tiādīsu kathaṁ pure asato jananakriyāya kattubhāvosiyāti?
anya-e0805n2:104_2: avijjamānampi hi loko saddābhidheyyatāya vijjamānaṁ viya gahetvā voharati ,
anya-e0805n2:104_3: vikappabuddhigahitākāroyeva hi saddenābhidhīyate, na tu vatthusabhāvo,
anya-e0805n2:104_4: aññathā sutamayañāṇenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhāvasacchikaraṇappasaṅgo ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhivādādīnamabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā,
anya-e0805n2:104_5: tasmā buddhiparikappitapaññattivasenapi saddappavatti hotīti asato saṁyogādissapi hoteva jananakriyāya kattukārakatāti.
anya-e0805n2:108_0: Buddhiyā gahitattā hi, saṁyogo jāyate iti;
anya-e0805n2:110_0: Tatra tatiyā jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā daṭṭho naro, buddhena bodhito loko, saddhehi kārito vihāro.
anya-e0805n2:111_0: Abhihite na bhavati. Kaṭaṁ karoti devadatto, kāreti vā.
anya-e0805n2:112_0: Itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe – sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānaṁ ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0805n2:112_1: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeyya,
anya-e0805n2:113_1: navahi māsehi vihāraṁ niṭṭhāpesi, yojanena adhītaṁ byākaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:114_0: Pubbādiyoge– māsena pubbo, pitarā sadiso, mātarā samo, kahāpaṇena ūno, dhanena vikalo, asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, vācāya nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṁ, tilena missakaṁ, vācāya sakhilo, maṇinā attho, dhanena attho, pitarā tulyo.
anya-e0805n2:120_0: Saha saddhiṁ samaṁ nānā vinā alaṁ kimiccevamādīhi yoge liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena sahatthepi.
anya-e0805n2:121_0: Tattha sahasaddena yogo kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati.
anya-e0805n2:121_1: Yathā – vitakkena saha vattati, puttena saha thūlo,
anya-e0805n2:121_3: nisīdi bhagavā saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṁ mitā,
anya-e0805n2:121_4: sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo,
anya-e0805n2:121_5: saṅgho vināpi gaggena uposathaṁ kareyya, alaṁ te idha vāsena, kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇena, purisena thāmadassinā, kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṁ te ajinasāṭiyā.
anya-e0805n2:122_0: Sahatthe– devadatto rājagahaṁ pāvisi kokālikena pacchāsamaṇena, dukkho bālehi saṁvāso.
anya-e0805n2:125_0: Kismiñci phale diṭṭhasāmatthiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ hetu, soyeva attho, tasmiṁ hetvatthe, annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjāya vasati.
anya-e0805n2:131_0: Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0805n2:132_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṁ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0805n2:133_0: Hetvatthappayoge – kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena, kena hetunā vasati.
anya-e0805n2:136_0: Kāladdhānadisādesādīsu cāyaṁ. Tena samayena, tena kālena, kālena dhammassavaṇaṁ, so vo mamaccayena satthā, māsena bhuñjati, yojanena dhāvati. Puratthimena dhataraṭṭho, dakkhiṇena virūḷhako, pacchimena virūpakkho,
anya-e0805n2:138_0: Yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate, tattha tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:138_1: Ettha ca aṅgamassa atthīti aṅgaṁ, sarīraṁ. Akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.
anya-e0805n2:140_1: Tasmiṁ gottanāmajātisippavayoguṇasaṅkhāte visesanatthe tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena pakatiādīhi ca. Gottena gotamo nātho.
anya-e0805n2:141_0: Sāriputtoti nāmena, vissuto paññavā ca so;
anya-e0805n2:145_0: Sippena naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṁso vayasā, vijjāya sādhu, paññāya sādhu, tapasā uttamo, suvaṇṇena abhirūpo.
anya-e0805n2:146_0: Pakatiādīsu – pakatiyā abhirūpo, yebhuyyena mattikā, samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṁ kiṇāti,
anya-e0805n2:151_0: 302.Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṁ sampadānaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:152_0: Yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate,
anya-e0805n2:153_1: Yathā – buddhassa pupphaṁ yajati, bodhirukkhassa jalaṁ dadāti.
anya-e0805n2:156_0: Sampadānaṁ tidhā vuttaṁ, rukkha yācaka bhikkhavo’’ti.
anya-e0805n2:160_0: 303.Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇapubbakattārocanatthatadattha tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini gatyatthakammani āsisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca.
anya-e0805n2:161_0: Catuppadamidaṁ . Silāgha katthane, hanu apanayane, ṭhā gatinivattimhi, sapa akkose, dhara dhāraṇe,
anya-e0805n2:161_1: piha icchāyaṁ iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ payoge, kudha kope, duha jighaṁsāyaṁ, issa issāyaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:161_2: usūya dosāvikaraṇe iccetesaṁ tadatthavācīnañca dhātūnaṁ payoge ca rādha hiṁsāsaṁrādhesu,
anya-e0805n2:161_3: ikkha dassanaṅkesūti imesaṁ payoge ca pati āpubbassa su savaṇeti imassa ca anupatipubbassa gesaddeti imassa ca pubbakattā ca ārocanatthappayoge, tadatthe, tumatthe,
anya-e0805n2:161_4: alamatthappayoge ca maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini ca gatyatthānaṁ kammani ca āsisatthappayoge ca sammuti bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe cāti taṁ kammādikārakaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ hoti,
anya-e0805n2:161_5: casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇatikappati pahoti upamāñjalikaraṇa phāsu atthaseyyappabhutiyoge ca pure viya catutthī.
anya-e0805n2:162_0: Silāghādippayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate. Upajjhāyassa silāghate, thometīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:163_0: Hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:164_2: Bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0805n2:166_0: Dhārayatippayoge dhanikoyeva sampadānaṁ, suvaṇṇaṁ te dhārayate, iṇaṁ dhārayatīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:167_1: devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, devāpi tesaṁ pihayanti, sambuddhānaṁ satīmataṁ, patthentīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:168_0: Kodhādiatthānaṁ payoge yaṁ pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṁ tassa kuppeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:169_0: Duhayati disānaṁ megho, yo mittānaṁ na dubbhati.
anya-e0805n2:171_0: Dujjanā guṇavantānaṁ usūyanti, kā usūyā vijānataṁ.
anya-e0805n2:172_0: Rādhikkhappayoge yassa vipucchanaṁ kammavikhyāpanatthaṁ, vādhikārato dutiyā ca. Ārādho me rañño, rañño aparajjhati, rājānaṁ vā aparajjhati, kyāhaṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi, kyāhaṁ ayye aparajjhāmi vā.
anya-e0805n2:173_0: Āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṁ vā.
anya-e0805n2:174_0: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṁ pubbakattā ca suṇotissa dhātussa paccāyoge,
anya-e0805n2:174_1: giṇassa ca anupatiyoge pubbassa kammuno yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
anya-e0805n2:174_5: Bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū,
anya-e0805n2:175_0: Yo vadeti sa kattāti, vuttaṁ kammanti vuccati;
anya-e0805n2:177_0: Ārocanatthappayoge yassa āroceti, taṁ sampadānaṁ. Ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, āmanta kho taṁ gacchāmāti vā.
anya-e0805n2:177_1: Ettha ca ārocanasaddassa kathanappakāratthattā desanatthādippayogepi catutthī. Dhammaṁ vo desessāmi,
anya-e0805n2:177_2: desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya,
anya-e0805n2:181_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n2:182_1: piṇḍapātaṁ paṭisevāmi neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā,
anya-e0805n2:183_0: Tumatthe – lokānukampāya, lokamanukampitunti attho. Tathā phāsuvihārāya.
anya-e0805n2:184_0: Alaṁsaddassa atthā arahapaṭikkhepā. Arahatthe – alaṁ me rajjaṁ, alaṁ bhikkhu pattassa,
anya-e0805n2:184_1: akkhadhutto purisapuggalo nālaṁ dārabharaṇāya, alaṁ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.
anya-e0805n2:185_0: Paṭikkhepe– alaṁ te idha vāsena, alaṁ me hiraññasuvaṇṇena, kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇena, kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṁ tettha catumaṭṭhassa.
anya-e0805n2:186_0: Maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini kammaniyeva – kaṭṭhassa tuvaṁ maññe, kaḷiṅgarassa tuvaṁ maññe,
anya-e0805n2:187_0: Anādareti kiṁ? Suvaṇṇaṁ taṁ maññe. Appāṇinīti kiṁ? Gadrabhaṁ tuvaṁ maññe.
anya-e0805n2:188_0: Gatyatthakammani vādhikārato dutiyā ca. Appo saggāya gacchati, appo saggaṁ gacchati, nibbānāya vajantiyā, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mūlaṁ paṭikasseyya.
anya-e0805n2:189_1: ‘‘totitā sasmiṁnāsū’’ti ntussa savibhattissa to ādeso. Bhaddaṁ bhavato hotu, kusalaṁ bhavato hotu, anāmayaṁ bhavato hotu, sukhaṁ bhavato hotu, atthaṁ bhavato hotu, hitaṁ bhavato hotu, svāgataṁ bhavato hotu, sotthi hotu sabbasattānaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:190_0: Sammutippayoge – sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya.
anya-e0805n2:192_0: Sattamiyatthe āvikaraṇa pātubhavanādiyoge – tuyhañcassa āvikaromi, tassa me sakko pāturahosi.
anya-e0805n2:193_1: phāsuādināmapayoge ca – tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṁ dūtaṁ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṁ āyogo,
anya-e0805n2:193_2: ekassa dinnaṁ dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ pahoti, upamaṁ te karissāmi, añjaliṁ te paggaṇhāmi. Tathā tassa phāsu hoti, lokassattho, maṇinā me attho, seyyo me attho iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:196_1: sotthisvāgatādīhi ca yoge liṅgamhā catutthīvibhatti hoti. Namo te buddha vīratthu, namo karohi nāgassa, namatthu buddhānaṁ, namatthu bodhiyā, sotthi pajānaṁ, svāgataṁ te mahārāja, atho te adurāgataṁ.
anya-e0805n2:199_0: Bhāvavācimhi catutthīvibhatti hoti bhavissatikāle. Bhavanaṁ bhāvo. Paccissate, pacanaṁ vā pāko, pākāya vajati, pacituṁ gacchatīti attho. Evaṁ bhogāya vajati iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:205_0: Taṁ pana tividhaṁ visayabhedena niddiṭṭhavisayaṁ, upāttavisayaṁ, anumeyyavisayañcāti.
anya-e0805n2:206_0: Apādānasaññāvisayassa kriyāvisesassa niddiṭṭhattā niddiṭṭhavisayaṁ. Yathā – gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā.
anya-e0805n2:207_2: tathāpi cittasaṁyogapubbakassa apagamanassa sambhavato iminā ca apādānasaññā.
anya-e0805n2:208_0: Yattha pana apagamanakriyaṁ upāttaṁ ajjhāhaṭaṁ visayaṁ katvā pavattati, taṁ upāttavisayaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:208_1: Yathā – valāhakā vijjotate vijju, kusūlato pacatīti.
anya-e0805n2:209_1: Ettha hi kenaci guṇena ukkaṁsīyantīti anumeyyova kriyāviseso.
anya-e0805n2:214_0: Calaṁ yathā – dhāvatā hatthimhā patito aṅkusadhārī.
anya-e0805n2:216_0: Bhayahetumhi – corā bhayaṁ jāyati, taṇhāya jāyatī bhayaṁ, pāpato uttasati,
anya-e0805n2:216_1: akkhātari – upajjhāyā sikkhaṁ gaṇhāti, ācariyamhā adhīte, ācariyato suṇāti.
anya-e0805n2:219_2: upasaggayoge ca ādisaddena nipātayoge ca taṁyuttaṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:220_0: Dhātuppayoge tāva – parājiyoge yo asayho, pabhūyoge pabhavo,
anya-e0805n2:220_5: aciravatiyā pabhavanti kunnadiyo. Kāmato jāyatī soko, yasmā so jāyate gini, urasmā jāto putto, kammato jātaṁ indriyaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:221_0: Nāmappayoge aññatthitarādīhi yutte – nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṁ dukkhā nirujjhati, tato aññena kammena, tato itaraṁ, ubhato sujāto putto iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:222_1: mariyādābhividhiatthe āyoge patinā patinidhipatidānatthena yoge ca.
anya-e0805n2:222_2: Yathā – apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṁ vajjetvāti attho.
anya-e0805n2:222_3: Tathā paripabbatā devo vassati, pabbataṁ vajjetvāti attho.
anya-e0805n2:222_7: Patinidhimhi – buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya ālapati temāsaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:223_0: Nipātayuttesu rite nānā vinādīhi yoge – rite saddhammā kuto sukhaṁ labhati.
anya-e0805n2:223_2: Vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati. Ariyehi puthagevāyaṁ jano,
anya-e0805n2:224_2: ito pakkhasmā migaṁ vijjhatīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:224_3: Evaṁ māsasmā bhuñjati bhojanaṁ, kosā vijjhati kuñjaraṁ.
anya-e0805n2:225_1: tadatthappayoge ca – yatohaṁ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jāto, yato sarāmi attānaṁ, yato pattosmi viññutaṁ, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ, yato pabhuti, yato paṭṭhāya, tato paṭṭhāya iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:227_1: taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti, cakārādhikārato anicchitañca. Rakkhaṇañcettha nivāraṇaṁ, tāyanañca. Kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulā, yavā paṭisedhenti gāvo.
anya-e0805n2:228_0: Anicchitaṁ yathā – pāpā cittaṁ nivāraye, pāpānivārenti,
anya-e0805n2:228_1: rājato vā corato vā aggito vā udakato vā nānābhayato vā nānārogato vā nānāupaddavato vā ārakkhaṁ gaṇhantu.
anya-e0805n2:231_1: taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti vā, antaradhānevāyaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:232_0: Vāti kiṁ? Jetavane antarahito. Yenāti kiṁ?
anya-e0805n2:233_0: 312.Dūrantikaddhakālanimmānatvālopadisāyogavibhattārappayoga suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamāṇa pubbayoga bandhana guṇavacana pañha kathanathokākattūsu ca.
anya-e0805n2:234_0: Dūratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmāne, kālanimmāne, tvālope, disāyoge, vibhatte, āratippayoge, suddhatthappayoge, pamocanatthappayoge, hetvatthe, vivittatthappayoge, pamāṇatthe, pubbayoge, bandhanatthappayoge, guṇavacane , pañhe, kathane, thokatthe, akattari ca yadavadhibhūtaṁ, hetukammādibhūtañca,
anya-e0805n2:234_1: taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti, casaddena yathāyogaṁ dutiyā, tatiyā, chaṭṭhī ca.
anya-e0805n2:235_0: Ettha ca dūrantikañca dūrantikatthañcāti dūrantikanti sarūpekasesaṁ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, tena dūrantikatthappayoge,
anya-e0805n2:236_0: Dūratthappayoge tāva – kīvadūro ito naḷakāragāmo, tato have dūrataraṁ vadanti, gāmato nātidūre.
anya-e0805n2:236_1: Ārakā te moghapurisā imasmā dhammavinayā, ārakā tehi bhagavā.
anya-e0805n2:236_2: Dūratthe – dūratova namassanti, addasa dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:237_0: Antikatthappayoge – antikaṁ gāmā, āsannaṁ gāmā, samīpaṁ gāmā, gāmassa samīpanti attho.
anya-e0805n2:238_0: Dutiyā, tatiyā ca, dūraṁ gāmaṁ āgato, dūrena gāmena āgato, dūrato gāmā āgatoti attho. Dūraṁ gāmena vā. Antikaṁ gāmaṁ āgato, antikaṁ gāmena vā, āsannaṁ gāmaṁ, āsannaṁ gāmena vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:239_1: tasmiṁ gamyamāne – ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:240_0: Kālanimmāne – ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi,
anya-e0805n2:241_3: Tathā hatthikkhandhā saṅkameyya, abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṁ sutvā vā, abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṁ paṭhitvā vā, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya, āsane nisīditvā vā.
anya-e0805n2:242_1: disatthe ca – ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, ito sā pacchimā disā, ito sā uttarā disā, avīcito uparibhavaggā, uddhaṁ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:243_0: Vibhattaṁ nāma sayaṁ vibhattasseva tadaññato guṇena vibhajanaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:243_1: tasmiṁ vibhatte – yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto tato varaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:243_3: tato mayā sutā assutameva bahutaraṁ, sīlameva sutā seyyo. Chaṭṭhī ca,
anya-e0805n2:244_0: Āratippayogo nāma viramaṇatthasaddappayogo. Tattha – asaddhammā ārati, virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā paṭivirato, appaṭivirato musāvādā.
anya-e0805n2:245_1: mātito ca pitito ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho agarahito.
anya-e0805n2:246_0: Pamocanatthappayoge– parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, muttohaṁ sabbapāsehi.
anya-e0805n2:247_1: sarūpekasesassa gahitattā hetvatthappayoge ca sabbanāmato – kasmā nu tumhaṁ daharā na mīyare,
anya-e0805n2:247_2: kasmā idheva maraṇaṁ bhavissati, kasmā hetunā, yasmā ca kammāni karonti, yasmā tiha bhikkhave,
anya-e0805n2:247_3: tasmā tiha bhikkhave evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇa, yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā, kiṁ kāraṇā. Dutiyā, chaṭṭhī ca, kiṁ kāraṇaṁ, taṁ kissa hetu, kissa tumhe kilamatha.
anya-e0805n2:248_0: Kena hetunā, kena kāraṇena, yena midhekacce sattā, tena nimittena,
anya-e0805n2:249_1: tadatthappayoge – vivitto pāpakā dhammā, vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi.
anya-e0805n2:250_2: gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:251_0: Dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā.
anya-e0805n2:252_0: Ettha ca ‘‘smāhismiṁna’’miccādito ‘‘smā’’ti ca ‘‘so, vā’’ti ca vattamāne
anya-e0805n2:254_0: Dīgha oraicceteti smāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n2:255_0: Dīghaso, dīghamhā vā, [oraso, oramhā vā] tatiyā ca, yojanaṁ āyāmena, yojanaṁ vitthārena, yojanaṁ ubbedhena sāsaparāsi.
anya-e0805n2:256_1: ettha ca pubbaggahaṇaṁ adisatthavuttino pubbādiggahaṇassupalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, tena parādiyogepi.
anya-e0805n2:256_2: Yathā – pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā, ito pubbenāhosi,
anya-e0805n2:256_3: tato paraṁ paccantimā janapadā, dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā, tato aparena samayena, tato uttarimpi iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:257_0: Bandhanatthappayoge bandhanahetumhi iṇe pañcamī, tatiyā ca hoti, satasmā baddho naro raññā, satena vā baddho naro.
anya-e0805n2:258_0: Phalasādhanahetubhūtassa guṇassa vacanaṁ guṇavacanaṁ, tasmiṁ guṇavacane pañcamī, tatiyā ca,
anya-e0805n2:258_1: issariyā janaṁ rakkhati rājā, issariyena vā, sīlato naṁ pasaṁsanti, sīlena vā, paññāya vimuttimano iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:259_0: Pañhakathanesu – kutosi tvaṁ, kuto bhavaṁ, pāṭaliputtato.
anya-e0805n2:260_0: Thokatthe asatvavacane karaṇe tatiyā ca, thokā muccati, thokena muccati vā, appamattakā muccati, appamattakena vā, kicchā muccati, kicchena vā.
anya-e0805n2:261_0: Akattariakārake ñāpakahetumhi – kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā uppannaṁ hoti cakkhuviññāṇa,
anya-e0805n2:261_1: na tāvidaṁ nāmarūpaṁ ahetukaṁ sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito.
anya-e0805n2:266_1: tasmiṁ kāraṇatthe ca pañcamīvibhatti hoti, vikappenāyaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:266_3: ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ adassanā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:271_2: taṁ pati so attho sāmisañño hoti.
anya-e0805n2:272_0: Ettha ca kriyābhisambandhābhāvā na kārakatā sambhavati.
anya-e0805n2:272_2: tathā hi ‘‘rañño puriso’’ti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti, puriso ca patiggaṇhāti,
anya-e0805n2:272_4: Evaṁ yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena vā bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa samūhāvayavavikāra kāriyaavatthā jāti guṇa kriyādivasena vā,
anya-e0805n2:272_5: tassa sabbassāpi so sambandhādhārabhūto visesanaṭṭhānī āgamīvasena tividhopi attho sāmī nāmāti gahetabbo.
anya-e0805n2:282_1: ettha ca rājā purisaṁ aññasāmito viseseti nivattetīti visesanaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:283_0: Bhaṇḍena sambandhe – pahūtaṁ me dhanaṁ sakka, etassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṁ.
anya-e0805n2:286_0: Avayavasambandhe – manussasseva te sīsaṁ, rukkhassa sākhā.
anya-e0805n2:288_0: Kāriyasambandhe – yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṁ phalaṁ vipāko.
anya-e0805n2:289_0: Avatthāsambandhe – khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo, khandhānaṁ jarā, khandhānaṁ bhedo.
anya-e0805n2:291_1: vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa, buddhassa guṇaghoso, pupphānaṁ gandho, phalānaṁ raso, cittassa phusanā, sippikānaṁ sataṁ natthi, tilānaṁ muṭṭhi, tesaṁ samāyogo, sandhino vimokkho,
anya-e0805n2:291_2: tathāgatassa paññāpāramiṁ ārabbha, pubbacariyaṁ vā, sukhaṁ te, dukkhaṁ te, cetaso parivitakko udapādi, paññāya paṭubhāvo, rūpassa lahutā, rūpassa mudutā, rūpassa upacayo.
anya-e0805n2:292_0: Kriyāsambandhe – pādassa ukkhipanaṁ, pādassa avakkhepanaṁ vā, hatthassa samiñjanaṁ, pādānaṁ pasāraṇaṁ, dhātūnaṁ gamanaṁ, dhātūnaṁyeva ṭhānaṁ, nisajjā, sayanaṁ vā. Tathā tassa nāmagottādi, tassa kāraṇaṁ, tassa mātāpitaro, tassa purato pāturahosi, tassa pacchato, nagarassa dakkhiṇato, vassānaṁ tatiye māse, na tassa upamā, kuverassa bali iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:296_0: Tabba rujādiyoge – mahāsenāpatīnaṁ ujjhāpetabbaṁ vikanditabbaṁ viravitabbaṁ, devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajjati, rajakassa vatthaṁ dadāti, musāvādassa ottappaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:300_0: Yajassa karaṇe – pupphassa buddhaṁ yajati, pupphena vā, ghatassa aggiṁ juhoti.
anya-e0805n2:301_0: Suhitatthayoge – pattaṁ odanassa pūretvā, odanenāti attho.
anya-e0805n2:301_1: Imameva kāyaṁ pūraṁ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati, pūraṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa.
anya-e0805n2:302_0: Tulyatthakimalamādiyoge – pitussa tulyo, pitarā vā tulyo, mātu sadiso, mātarā sadiso vā, kiṁ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa, kiṁ tena tuṭṭhenāti attho. Alaṁ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa.
anya-e0805n2:303_0: Kattari kitappaccayayoge – sobhanā kaccāyanassa kati, kaccāyanena vā, rañño sammato, raññā vā, evaṁ rañño pūjito, rañño sakkato, rañño apacito, rañño mānito,
anya-e0805n2:304_0: Sattamiyatthe kusalādiyoge – kusalā naccagītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiyo,
anya-e0805n2:304_1: kusalo tvaṁ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṁ, kusalo maggassa, kusalo amaggassa,
anya-e0805n2:304_2: santi hi bhante uḷārā yakkhā bhagavato pasannā, divasassa tikkhattuṁ, divase tikkhattuṁ vā, māsassa dvikkhattuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:308_0: Dutiyatthe kammani kitakayoge – tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro, amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṁ sandhātā, sahitānaṁ anuppadātā, bodhetā pajāya, kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṁvādako lokassa, pāpānaṁ akaraṇaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:309_0: Tathā saricchādīnaṁ kammani – mātu sarati, mātaraṁ sarati, na tesaṁ koci sarati, sattānaṁ kammappaccayā, puttassa icchati, puttamicchati.
anya-e0805n2:310_0: Karotissapatiyatane ca – patiyatanaṁ abhisaṅkhāro, udakassa patikurute, udakaṁ patikurute, kaṇḍassa patikurute, kaṇḍaṁ patikurute.
anya-e0805n2:311_1: kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno,
anya-e0805n2:312_1: kālena dhammiṁ kathaṁ bhāsitā hoti, paresaṁ puññāni anumoditā, bujjhitā saccāni, kaṭaṁ kārako, pasavo ghātako.
anya-e0805n2:313_0: Tathā na niṭṭhādīsu ca – sukhakāmī vihāraṁ kato, rathaṁ katavanto, rathaṁ katāvī, kaṭaṁ katvā, kaṭaṁ karonto, kaṭaṁ karāno, kaṭaṁ kurumāno iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:319_1: Kattukammasamavetānaṁ nisajjapacanādikriyānaṁ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena yo ādhāro, taṁ kārakaṁ okāsasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:320_0: Kaṭe nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati.
anya-e0805n2:320_1: Ettha hi devadattataṇḍulānaṁ kattukammānaṁ dhāraṇato taṁsamavetaṁ āsanapacanasaṅkhātaṁ kriyaṁ dhāreti nāma.
anya-e0805n2:321_0: So panāyamokāso catubbidho byāpiko opasilesiko sāmīpiko vesayikoti.
anya-e0805n2:322_0: Tattha byāpiko nāma yattha sakalopi ādhārabhūto attho ādheyyena patthaṭo hoti,
anya-e0805n2:322_2: taṁ yathā – tilesu telaṁ atthi, khīlesu jalaṁ, dadhimhi sappīti.
anya-e0805n2:323_0: Opasilesiko nāma paccekasiddhānaṁ bhāvānaṁ yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti,
anya-e0805n2:323_2: taṁ yathā – āsane nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati, ghaṭesu udakaṁ atthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhitoti.
anya-e0805n2:324_0: Sāmīpiko nāma yattha samīpe samīpivohāraṁ katvā tadāyattavuttitādīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvo vikappīyati,
anya-e0805n2:324_3: Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane, sāvatthiyā samīpeti attho.
anya-e0805n2:325_2: taṁ yathā – ākāse sakuṇā pakkhanti, bhūmīsu manussā caranti, jalesu macchā, pādesu patito, pāpasmiṁ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye nipuṇo, mātari sādhu, pitari nipuṇo iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:326_0: Sabbopi cāyamādhāro padhānavasena vā parikappitavasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavatīti okāsotveva vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0805n2:338_0: Sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhipatibhū pasūta kusalaiccetehi yoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. Ubhayatthaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:339_0: Gavaṁ sāmi, gosu sāmi, gavaṁ issaro, gosu issaro, gavaṁ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gavaṁ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gavaṁ sakkhi, gosu sakkhi, gavaṁ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gavaṁ pasūto, gosu pasūto, gavaṁ kusalo, gosu kusalo.
anya-e0805n2:341_1: jāti guṇa kriyā nāmehi samudāyato ekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:341_2: tasmiṁ niddhāraṇatthe gamyamāne tato samudāyavāciliṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0805n2:342_0: Manussānaṁ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo,
anya-e0805n2:342_5: āyasmā ānando arahataṁ aññataro ahosi, arahantesu vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:344_0: Anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0805n2:344_1: Akāmakānaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ rudantānaṁ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu pabbaji.
anya-e0805n2:351_0: Kammatthe – bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā.
anya-e0805n2:352_0: Karaṇatthe – hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, sopi maṁ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake.
anya-e0805n2:353_0: Nimittatthe– dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate,
anya-e0805n2:356_0: Sampadānatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Saṅghe dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, saṅghe gotami dehi,
anya-e0805n2:356_1: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
anya-e0805n2:357_0: Yā palālamayaṁ mālaṁ, nārī datvāna cetiye;
anya-e0805n2:360_0: Pañcamyatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti.
anya-e0805n2:362_0: Kālo nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇhādiko, bhāvo nāma kriyā,
anya-e0805n2:362_2: tasmiṁ kālatthe ca bhāvalakkhaṇe bhāvatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:363_0: Kāle – pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato, akāle vassati tassa, kāle tassa na vassati,
anya-e0805n2:363_1: phussamāsamhā tīsu māsesu vesākhamāso, ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji cakkhumā.
anya-e0805n2:364_0: Bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe– bhikkhusaṅghesu bhojīyamānesu gato, bhuttesu āgato, gosu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu āgato,
anya-e0805n2:364_1: jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṁ dasasahassilokadhātu saṁkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
anya-e0805n2:369_1: issaratthe ca vattamānehi upaadhiiccetehi yoge adhikissaravacane gamyamāne liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:370_0: Adhikavacane – upa khāriyaṁ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikoti attho. Tathā upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṁ, adhi devesu buddho,
anya-e0805n2:370_1: sammutiupapattivisuddhidevasaṅkhātehi tividhehipi devehi sabbaññū buddhova adhikoti attho.
anya-e0805n2:373_0: Maṇḍitaussukkaiccetesvatthesu gamyamānesu liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0805n2:373_1: Maṇḍitasaddo panettha pasannatthavācako, ussukkasaddo saīhattho. Ñāṇena pasanno, ñāṇasmiṁ pasanno, ñāṇena ussukko, ñāṇasmiṁ ussukko sappuriso.
anya-e0805n2:375_0: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṁ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0805n2:376_0: Karaṇaṁ duvidhaṁ hoti, sampadānaṁ tidhā mataṁ;
anya-e0805n2:378_0: Vibhattiyo pana paccattavacanādivasena aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti. Yathāha
